provider.documentation: Name of the person who has filled this file

description.documentation: Detailed description of this mapping file

mapping_info.description: Correspondance between itm data description and Tore-Supra data

firstputdate.documentation: Date when this file was first submitted to the ITM

lastputdate.documentation: Date when this file was last updated

shot_min.documentation: Minimum shot number in the experiment database for which this mapping file is valid

shot_max.documentation: Maximum shot number in the experiment database for which this mapping file is valid

flux_loop.documentation: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described
flux_loop.name: 'BFT001'

position.documentation: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the loop (see data structure documentation FLUXLOOPposition.pdf)

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

poloidal_angle.documentation: Poloidal angle of the coil orientation

toroidal_angle.documentation: Toroidal angle of coil orientation (0 if fully in the poloidal plane)

area.documentation: Area of each turn of the coil

length.documentation: Area of each turn of the coil

turns.documentation: Turns in the coil, including sign

position.documentation: R, Z, Phi position of the coil centre

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

method.documentation: A method generating processed quantities derived from the magnetic measurements

ip.documentation: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above.

data.documentation: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above.

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

data.name: SIPMES

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).
